Method Detail

getFormattedMessage

public java.lang.String getFormattedMessage(java.util.Locale locale,
                                            java.lang.String key,
                                            java.lang.Object[] arguments)
Description copied from interface: MessageSource
Get the localized message for a given message code, parameters, and locale

Specified by:
getFormattedMessage in interface MessageSource
Parameters:
locale - The locale. If this is null, the default locale is used.
key - The message code
arguments - Any paramaters that should be included in the formatted message
Returns:
A message corresponding to the passed in message key, that has been formatted using the specified arguments for the given locale. If unable to find a message corresponding to the key or locale, null will be returned.

setSource

public void setSource(org.springframework.context.MessageSource source)
